.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_IMAGE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkExternalMemoryImageCreateInfo
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkImageCreateFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-imageType-parameter]] pname:imageType must: be a valid elink:VkImageType value
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-format-parameter]] pname:format must: be a valid elink:VkFormat value
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-samples-parameter]] pname:samples must: be a valid elink:VkSampleCountFlagBits value
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-tiling-parameter]] pname:tiling must: be a valid elink:VkImageTiling value
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-usage-parameter]] pname:usage must: be a valid combination of elink:VkImageUsageFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-usage-requiredbitmask]] pname:usage must: not be `0`
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-sharingMode-parameter]] pname:sharingMode must: be a valid elink:VkSharingMode value
* [[VUID-VkImageCreateInfo-initialLayout-parameter]] pname:initialLayout must: be a valid elink:VkImageLayout value
****
